page.title: 16SUNDAY, JULY 7TH 1985
page.content: Later in the afternoon she took her daughter to Watford Station and then played golf with her husband. On returning she had supper and tidied up.Later she joined her family who were watching T.V. and she sewed. Francesca got up at 9.00,she washed her hair before visiting friends.After lunch at home, she spent the afternoon and early evening with her family then she went to the pub. Rachel got up at 8.15 and after breakfast went to the stables to groom her pony ready for a show. On arrival she happened to meet her pony's previous owner and then entered the novice competition in which she was not placed although she did a clear round. In the afternoon she came third in "Ride and Lead" competition.She hacked home, did some cross-country and mucked out her pony. She returned home at 5.30.
